title: Split Dashboard.tsx into smaller components
summary: All acceptance criteria verified. Dashboard.tsx has been successfully refactored from 557 lines to 119 lines. All extracted components exist and are properly imported.

acceptance_criteria_verification.details: Dashboard.tsx is now 119 lines (including empty line at end), well under the 150 line requirement
All 5 components (MarketOverview, ChartSection, WatchlistPanel, IndicatorsSection, PerformanceDashboard) are self-contained with their own imports and interfaces
All original functionality preserved: market indices display, chart with period/interval selectors, watchlist with positions, technical indicators section, performance dashboard toggle
All components have TypeScript interfaces for props. Types exported from useDashboardData.ts hook.
TypeScript check shows no dashboard-related errors. Errors found are in PatternInsights.tsx and botApi.ts (unrelated to this task)

files_verified.notes: Composes all extracted components with proper props. Uses useDashboardData hook for state management.
Contains all fetch logic, state management, and exported types (StockQuote, WatchlistStock, Position, TechnicalIndicators, TimeInterval)
Self-contained component for market indices display with proper MarketOverviewProps interface
Self-contained chart component with interval/period selectors. Imports StockChart component.
Self-contained watchlist with positions display. Uses react-router-dom Link for navigation.
Self-contained indicators display with IndicatorCard sub-component. Uses getStatusColor helper from utils.
Existing component properly imported in Dashboard.tsx
Helper functions getSymbolName() and getStatusColor() extracted to utils as required

typescript_check.details: No dashboard-related TypeScript errors. Unrelated errors in PatternInsights.tsx (unused imports, type mismatch) and botApi.ts (unused import)

duplicate_code_check.details: No duplicate code between Dashboard.tsx and extracted components. Dashboard.tsx now purely composes the extracted components.

imports_verification.details: Dashboard.tsx correctly imports: useDashboardData from hooks, MarketOverview/ChartSection/WatchlistPanel/IndicatorsSection/PerformanceDashboard from components/dashboard
